till a lot later, huh, Darla?

248
00:24:14,339 --> 00:24:18,202
She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

249
00:24:18,276 --> 00:24:20,514
l don't have any dolls.

250
00:24:20,581 --> 00:24:23,812
Get some food, huh?

251
00:24:23,879 --> 00:24:26,749
Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

252
00:24:32,202 --> 00:24:35,749
- ''Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.''
- [ Laughing ]

253
00:24:45,359 --> 00:24:48,459
Thirty, forty dollars.

254
00:24:50,161 --> 00:24:52,497
Who the fuck is this now?

255
00:24:52,561 --> 00:24:56,557
Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

256
00:24:56,628 --> 00:24:59,181
- Cerrado!
- [ Pounding ]

257
00:24:59,252 --> 00:25:02,931
Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

258
00:25:08,215 --> 00:25:10,158
[ Muttering ]

259
00:25:10,232 --> 00:25:14,325
Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

260
00:25:15,962 --> 00:25:17,621
Hey! Hey!

261
00:25:19,580 --> 00:25:21,588
- [ Cawing ]
- [ Screams ]

262
00:25:21,660 --> 00:25:25,852
''Suddenly l heard
a tapping, as if someone...

263
00:25:25,918 --> 00:25:29,695
gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''

264
00:25:31,584 --> 00:25:33,789
What are you talking about?

265
00:25:33,857 --> 00:25:36,476
You heard me rapping, right?

266
00:25:36,546 --> 00:25:40,509
You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

267
00:25:42,821 --> 00:25:45,691
l'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

268
00:25:45,765 --> 00:25:47,075
Gold.

269
00:25:47,143 --> 00:25:49,380
You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

270
00:25:53,481 --> 00:25:58,404
Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

271
00:25:58,475 --> 00:26:00,897
Shit on me.
Shit on me!

272
00:26:06,798 --> 00:26:08,969
- Aaah!
- Mr. Gideon.

273
00:26:09,039 --> 00:26:11,210
You're not paying attention.

274
00:26:14,000 --> 00:26:16,074
No! [ Screaming ]

275
00:26:16,145 --> 00:26:21,232
l repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

276
00:26:22,804 --> 00:26:26,122
lt was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

277
00:26:28,726 --> 00:26:32,241
He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

278
00:26:32,312 --> 00:26:35,346
[ Helicopter Departing ]

279
00:26:37,337 --> 00:26:39,248
Who's this sack of shit?

280
00:26:39,323 --> 00:26:42,171
That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

281
00:26:42,235 --> 00:26:45,171
l think you can rule out
accidental death.

282
00:26:45,245 --> 00:26:47,929
Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

283
00:26:47,997 --> 00:26:51,992
This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

284
00:26:52,063 --> 00:26:56,604
Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

285
00:26:56,673 --> 00:26:58,528
l'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

286
00:26:58,594 --> 00:27:02,207
Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

287
00:27:03,363 --> 00:27:05,666
What the hell
do you call that?

288
00:27:06,692 --> 00:27:09,180
l call it blood, detective.

289
00:27:09,253 --> 00:27:12,867
l suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

290
00:27:12,935 --> 00:27:15,587
You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

291
00:27:15,656 --> 00:27:19,487
[ Helicopter Approaching ]

292
00:27:22,060 --> 00:27:24,843
- Warmer?
- What are you doing?

293
00:27:24,909 --> 00:27:27,430
- Don't you know this game?
- What game?

294
00:27:27,502 --> 00:27:30,286
Okay, the rings!
l'll tell you about the rings!

295
00:27:30,351 --> 00:27:34,576
They're in that metal box!
lt's under the shelf there!

296
00:27:34,642 --> 00:27:39,946
Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

297
00:27:43,381 --> 00:27:45,870
- Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

298
00:27:54,649 --> 00:27:56,592
No, no.

299
00:27:56,666 --> 00:27:59,667
No, no, no.

300
00:28:02,043 --> 00:28:06,103
Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

301
00:28:09,855 --> 00:28:12,125
Shelly.

302
00:28:19,970 --> 00:28:21,313
l love you.

303
00:28:26,181 --> 00:28:28,931
[ Groaning ]

304
00:28:28,998 --> 00:28:31,813
- You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

305
00:28:31,879 --> 00:28:34,847
- Thank you.
- Take anything!

306
00:28:34,920 --> 00:28:37,671
Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

307
00:28:37,737 --> 00:28:40,258
the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

308
00:28:40,330 --> 00:28:42,632
The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

309
00:28:42,699 --> 00:28:47,589
T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

310
00:28:47,661 --> 00:28:50,532
- Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

311
00:28:50,607 --> 00:28:54,219
- A whole jolly club...
- Please!

312
00:28:54,287 --> 00:28:56,939
- with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

313
00:28:57,008 --> 00:28:59,563
- Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!

314
00:29:01,170 --> 00:29:04,433
Each one of these is a life...

315
00:29:04,500 --> 00:29:06,922
a life you helped destroy.

316
00:29:06,996 --> 00:29:09,484
l'm begging you.
Don't kill me.

317
00:29:09,557 --> 00:29:13,104
l'm not gonna kill you.

318
00:29:13,175 --> 00:29:17,169
Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

319
00:29:17,240 --> 00:29:20,624
tonight.

320
00:29:25,468 --> 00:29:29,495
Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

321
00:29:31,326 --> 00:29:35,221
You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

322
00:29:35,294 --> 00:29:38,776
You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

323
00:29:38,848 --> 00:29:40,921
ls that gasoline l smell?

324
00:29:40,993 --> 00:29:43,809
No, man, no!
No!

325
00:29:43,874 --> 00:29:45,850
No!

326
00:29:45,923 --> 00:29:47,200
No!

327
00:29:50,116 --> 00:29:52,637
[ Screaming ]

328
00:29:55,815 --> 00:30:00,487
[ Screaming ]

329
00:30:02,249 --> 00:30:05,567
lt's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

330
00:30:05,642 --> 00:30:07,814
One root beer.

331
00:30:09,771 --> 00:30:12,390
[ Bartender ] l can't do anything.

332
00:30:12,460 --> 00:30:16,740
Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

333
00:30:16,815 --> 00:30:18,855
Yeah, way off.

334
00:30:19,984 --> 00:30:23,214
[ Tires Screeching, Door Opening ]

335
00:30:23,281 --> 00:30:27,985
Police! Don't move!
l said, ''Don't move!''

336
00:30:28,051 --> 00:30:30,954
l thought the police
always said, ''Freeze!''

337
00:30:31,028 --> 00:30:34,805
l am the police and l say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.

338
00:30:34,870 --> 00:30:39,825
And l say l'm dead and l move.

339
00:30:39,895 --> 00:30:43,060
Not one more step.
l'm serious.

340
00:30:43,128 --> 00:30:47,319
Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

341
00:30:47,386 --> 00:30:50,387
What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

342
00:30:50,459 --> 00:30:52,118
You high?

343
00:30:52,188 --> 00:30:55,255
- You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

344
00:30:55,325 --> 00:30:59,156
How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

345
00:30:59,230 --> 00:31:01,784
Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

346
00:31:01,855 --> 00:31:06,265
l want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

347
00:31:06,337 --> 00:31:10,975
Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

348
00:31:11,043 --> 00:31:15,322
- lt's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.

349
00:31:15,397 --> 00:31:17,732
Do you know someone named T-bird?

350
00:31:17,798 --> 00:31:22,207
He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

351
00:31:22,279 --> 00:31:24,769
You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

352
00:31:24,841 --> 00:31:28,190
- [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

353
00:31:28,265 --> 00:31:33,418
- [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

354
00:31:33,484 --> 00:31:36,997
They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

355
00:31:37,068 --> 00:31:39,404
Get away from there!

356
00:31:39,470 --> 00:31:42,471
Cops!
Get outta here!

357
00:31:42,543 --> 00:31:45,806
- [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

358
00:31:50,962 --> 00:31:55,120
- Oh, great, great.
- [ Siren Wailing ]

359
00:31:55,188 --> 00:31:57,676
Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

360
00:31:57,748 --> 00:31:59,986
and you lose him
right out in the open.

361
00:32:00,054 --> 00:32:05,653
Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. l hate that.

362
00:32:05,719 --> 00:32:09,495
Little early
for Devil's Night.

363
00:32:11,002 --> 00:32:13,621
You are very restless.

364
00:32:13,691 --> 00:32:16,791
Just wish l was a little
hungry again, that's all.

365
00:32:16,860 --> 00:32:20,920
- Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, l may get it, l know.

366
00:32:24,383 --> 00:32:26,871
[ Sizzling ]

367
00:32:26,944 --> 00:32:30,393
** [ Rock And Roll, lndistinct ]

368
00:32:31,938 --> 00:32:34,841
There are energies
aligning against you.

369
00:32:34,915 --> 00:32:37,283
Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

370
00:32:43,942 --> 00:32:47,588
[ Door Opening, Closing ]

371
00:32:47,656 --> 00:32:50,526
Mmm, yummy.

372
00:32:55,658 --> 00:32:59,457
Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

373
00:32:59,532 --> 00:33:02,632
Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

374
00:33:02,701 --> 00:33:04,392
l didn't have nothing
to do with that.

375
00:33:04,462 --> 00:33:07,015
[ Man ] You must be
awfully disappointed.

376
00:33:07,086 --> 00:33:10,284
l got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

377
00:33:10,352 --> 00:33:12,557
- Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

378
00:33:12,625 --> 00:33:17,002
Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

379
00:33:17,075 --> 00:33:19,531
Gentlemen, by all means,
l think we ought to have...

380
00:33:19,604 --> 00:33:22,671
an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

381
00:33:25,238 --> 00:33:27,694
You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

382
00:33:27,766 --> 00:33:30,451
- Whatever you say, l can do.
- Good.

383
00:33:30,520 --> 00:33:33,204
That's very reassuring.

384
00:33:33,272 --> 00:33:37,136
l still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

385
00:33:37,210 --> 00:33:41,490
ls that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?

386
00:33:41,563 --> 00:33:43,353
Call it my need to know.

387
00:34:09,191 --> 00:34:10,980
[ Sighing ]

388
00:34:13,096 --> 00:34:15,518
[ Honking, Tires Screeching ]

389
00:34:15,593 --> 00:34:18,082
Let go, you creep!

390
00:34:21,259 --> 00:34:22,950
- Nah.
- [ Laughing ]

391
00:34:23,020 --> 00:34:26,185
You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

392
00:34:27,534 --> 00:34:29,836
He couldn't have stopped.

393
00:34:29,903 --> 00:34:34,028
He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

394
00:34:34,096 --> 00:34:37,031
What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

395
00:34:37,104 --> 00:34:39,015
Sometimes.

396
00:34:41,011 --> 00:34:45,551
lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

397
00:34:46,677 --> 00:34:50,027
- lt can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

398
00:34:58,983 --> 00:35:01,984
[ Phone Ringing ]

399
00:35:06,282 --> 00:35:10,692
Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

400
00:35:10,764 --> 00:35:14,921
Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

401
00:35:14,989 --> 00:35:18,286
Annie... look at that.

402
00:35:18,350 --> 00:35:22,411
''We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--''

403
00:35:22,481 --> 00:35:24,456
What is this, a petition?

404
00:35:24,529 --> 00:35:27,280
Big ''kick me'' sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

405
00:35:27,346 --> 00:35:31,276
- The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

406
00:35:31,348 --> 00:35:37,013
Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

407
00:35:37,078 --> 00:35:40,495
The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

408
00:35:40,568 --> 00:35:44,398
- l know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- l bet he does.

409
00:35:51,132 --> 00:35:54,711
You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

410
00:35:54,781 --> 00:35:56,822
l'm cool.

411
00:35:56,894 --> 00:36:01,434
You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

412
00:36:01,503 --> 00:36:03,894
Ah, l owe you one!

413
00:36:03,968 --> 00:36:05,911
Yeah, right.

414
00:36:05,985 --> 00:36:08,058
Damn.

415
00:36:21,095 --> 00:36:24,412
** [ Rock And Roll ]

416
00:36:32,459 --> 00:36:36,169
Tomorrow night
we can get high...

417
00:36:36,236 --> 00:36:39,783
and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

418
00:36:42,510 --> 00:36:45,511
- * l am the park *
- [ Caws ]

419
00:36:45,583 --> 00:36:49,065
* l am glow *

420
00:36:49,137 --> 00:36:53,034
* ln the motherfuckin' dark *

421
00:36:53,108 --> 00:36:55,181
* l am shocked *

422
00:36:55,252 --> 00:36:57,391
* And l see *

423
00:36:57,460 --> 00:37:00,494
* l don't want to believe *

424
00:37:00,566 --> 00:37:03,567
* No more *

425
00:37:03,639 --> 00:37:06,160
- There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- * No more **

426
00:37:06,232 --> 00:37:08,119
- Huh?
- [ Cawing ]

427
00:37:09,240 --> 00:37:12,024
- lt's a squab.
- [ Laughing ]

428
00:37:12,090 --> 00:37:14,611
Come here, bird.

429
00:37:14,683 --> 00:37:16,691
Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.

430
00:37:16,764 --> 00:37:19,002
Bird. B-B-Birdie.

431
00:37:19,069 --> 00:37:21,558
Here, birdie, birdie.

432
00:37:21,629 --> 00:37:24,500
Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.

433
00:37:27,008 --> 00:37:30,108
Birdie? Hey, birdie?

434
00:37:30,177 --> 00:37:32,665
Here, Funboy.

435
00:37:34,882 --> 00:37:36,771
What the fuck?

436
00:37:40,421 --> 00:37:42,843
[ Strumming Guitar ]

437
00:37:42,917 --> 00:37:47,262
No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

438
00:37:47,336 --> 00:37:49,409
Look at him.

439
00:37:49,480 --> 00:37:52,230
[ Funboy ] Don't sweat it.

440
00:37:53,867 --> 00:37:56,770
lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

441
00:38:04,366 --> 00:38:09,004
Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

442
00:38:10,928 --> 00:38:15,665
You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?

443
00:38:15,730 --> 00:38:19,114
You need professional help.

444
00:38:20,819 --> 00:38:23,309
- [ Groaning ]
- Bingo!

445
00:38:23,382 --> 00:38:25,903
He shoots! He scores!

446
00:38:27,990 --> 00:38:30,861
- [ Cawing ]
- [ Laughing ]

447
00:38:32,153 --> 00:38:35,568
[ Cheering, Laughing ]

448
00:38:35,641 --> 00:38:39,188
- Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?

449
00:38:39,258 --> 00:38:41,878
Stop me if you heard this one.

450
00:38:41,948 --> 00:38:44,763
Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

451
00:38:44,829 --> 00:38:46,685
[ Whimpering ]

452
00:38:46,749 --> 00:38:48,474
Ow.

453
00:38:49,951 --> 00:38:52,602
He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...

454
00:38:52,672 --> 00:38:56,088
Don't you ever fuckin' die?

455
00:38:56,161 --> 00:38:58,301
''Can you put me up for the night?''

456
00:38:58,369 --> 00:39:01,720
[ Groaning ]

457
00:39:03,588 --> 00:39:07,997
- Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

458
00:39:08,069 --> 00:39:10,044
Oh, God.

459
00:39:10,118 --> 00:39:14,048
Look what you've done
to my sheets.

460
00:39:15,880 --> 00:39:17,442
[ Gun Uncocking ]

461
00:39:23,596 --> 00:39:25,287
[ Crying ]

462
00:39:25,356 --> 00:39:28,772
[ Sobbing ]

463
00:39:37,297 --> 00:39:39,184
l've got a gun
in my pocket.

464
00:39:42,098 --> 00:39:44,718
You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

465
00:40:01,754 --> 00:40:05,464
Stay away!
Stay away from me!

466
00:40:06,876 --> 00:40:09,048
[ Screaming ]

467
00:40:13,022 --> 00:40:16,668
Look.

468
00:40:16,736 --> 00:40:21,047
Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

469
00:40:21,121 --> 00:40:25,694
Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

470
00:40:35,683 --> 00:40:40,289
Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

471
00:41:08,848 --> 00:41:12,362
lf l wanted ice,
l would have asked for ice!

472
00:41:12,433 --> 00:41:14,606
Now fill it up!

473
00:41:15,666 --> 00:41:18,897
Fill it up yourself, macho man.

474
00:41:18,964 --> 00:41:21,550
l really need this.

475
00:41:27,832 --> 00:41:29,719
All right.

476
00:41:29,784 --> 00:41:33,560
You burn yourself
playing with matches?

477
00:41:33,625 --> 00:41:36,114
- Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

478
00:41:36,186 --> 00:41:38,554
- Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

479
00:41:38,619 --> 00:41:41,435
This is a first.
Do l bow or do l curtsy?

480
00:41:41,500 --> 00:41:44,184
Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

481
00:41:44,253 --> 00:41:47,550
Oh! Hey, hey, hon!

482
00:41:47,614 --> 00:41:50,398
Hey, good night, Darla.

483
00:41:52,736 --> 00:41:56,283
- You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

484
00:42:04,037 --> 00:42:07,354
Get away, steamhead.

485
00:42:23,244 --> 00:42:25,733
[ Groaning ]

486
00:42:25,805 --> 00:42:27,693
Shh.

487
00:42:37,234 --> 00:42:42,735
[ Man On Radio ] As you can see, l'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

488
00:42:42,803 --> 00:42:45,422
- [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

489
00:42:45,492 --> 00:42:48,363
lt was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

490
00:42:48,438 --> 00:42:51,253
across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

491
00:42:51,319 --> 00:42:53,393
The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

492
00:42:53,465 --> 00:42:55,505
but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

493
00:42:55,577 --> 00:43:00,150
ln fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--

494
00:43:00,218 --> 00:43:03,034
Freeze!

495
00:43:03,099 --> 00:43:06,450
Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

496
00:43:06,525 --> 00:43:08,412
[ Whispering ] Fuck.

497
00:43:10,302 --> 00:43:12,408
Good likeness.

498
00:43:12,479 --> 00:43:16,026
l saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.

499
00:43:16,097 --> 00:43:18,269
You still have your hat on.

500
00:43:22,019 --> 00:43:24,027
l gotta sit down.

501
00:43:24,803 --> 00:43:26,659
Shi--

502
00:43:26,724 --> 00:43:29,474
[ Albrecht ] Holy Shit.

503
00:43:30,854 --> 00:43:33,408
Say...

504
00:43:33,479 --> 00:43:37,604
are you some kind of... ghost?

505
00:43:37,672 --> 00:43:39,561
Boo!

506
00:43:46,828 --> 00:43:51,205
l don't know what l am. l need you
to tell me what happened to us.

507
00:43:53,134 --> 00:43:57,031
You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.

508
00:43:57,104 --> 00:44:00,072
She, ah, was beaten and raped.

509
00:44:00,145 --> 00:44:04,554
Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

510
00:44:04,627 --> 00:44:07,148
Come on. Read the file.

511
00:44:07,219 --> 00:44:11,411
Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.

512
00:44:11,478 --> 00:44:14,545
Her body finally just gave it up.

513
00:44:14,615 --> 00:44:18,325
l saw it.
l couldn't do jack for her.

514
00:44:27,803 --> 00:44:29,659
- Hey.
- Don't touch me!

515
00:44:29,724 --> 00:44:33,555
- [ Sobbing ]
- Hey.

516
00:44:34,910 --> 00:44:37,628
You okay?

517
00:44:37,695 --> 00:44:40,282
l saw her.

518
00:44:41,857 --> 00:44:45,022
l saw her
through your eyes.

519
00:44:45,090 --> 00:44:47,099
You stayed with her
the whole time.

520
00:44:47,170 --> 00:44:52,411
Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

521
00:44:52,485 --> 00:44:57,026
l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

522
00:44:57,095 --> 00:44:59,911
Give me something
l could work with.

523
00:44:59,976 --> 00:45:02,115
Yeah.

524
00:45:02,184 --> 00:45:04,520
Look, l--

525
00:45:04,585 --> 00:45:06,975
Why didn't you do
something about it?

526
00:45:07,051 --> 00:45:10,249
You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

527
00:45:10,316 --> 00:45:13,633
would talk after
what happened to you?

528
00:45:13,709 --> 00:45:16,809
l kept asking
questions and...

529
00:45:16,878 --> 00:45:19,432
finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

530
00:45:23,281 --> 00:45:25,169
This your wife?

531
00:45:25,233 --> 00:45:29,545
Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

532
00:45:31,316 --> 00:45:34,164
lt's funny.

533
00:45:34,229 --> 00:45:38,060
Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

534
00:45:38,135 --> 00:45:41,485
l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

535
00:45:41,560 --> 00:45:44,463
Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

536
00:45:53,693 --> 00:45:57,971
You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

537
00:46:02,464 --> 00:46:05,531
You going to vanish
into thin air again?

538
00:46:09,025 --> 00:46:11,612
l thought l'd use
your front door.

539
00:46:14,532 --> 00:46:20,131
Look, man, l'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

540
00:46:21,607 --> 00:46:23,844
Yeah.

541
00:46:28,201 --> 00:46:30,690
- [ Door Opening, Closing ]
- [ Whispering ] Yeah.

542
00:46:30,762 --> 00:46:34,146
[ Gideon ] l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

543
00:46:34,220 --> 00:46:37,221
l watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

544
00:46:37,293 --> 00:46:40,229
And then my business
gets blown up real good.

545
00:46:40,302 --> 00:46:43,401
- Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

546
00:46:43,470 --> 00:46:45,894
l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

547
00:46:45,969 --> 00:46:50,225
He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

548
00:46:50,289 --> 00:46:55,113
He winked at ya?
Musicians.

549
00:46:55,187 --> 00:46:57,555
- What else did you see?
- So far l haven't heard...

550
00:46:57,621 --> 00:47:00,010
shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

551
00:47:00,085 --> 00:47:05,390
What do l get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

552
00:47:05,463 --> 00:47:08,115
You ain't lost everything.

553
00:47:08,184 --> 00:47:13,074
Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

554
00:47:13,146 --> 00:47:16,595
Fair enough. Catch.

555
00:47:17,661 --> 00:47:19,996
Aah! Jesus.

556
00:47:20,061 --> 00:47:22,396
Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

557
00:47:22,462 --> 00:47:24,372
What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

558
00:47:24,446 --> 00:47:27,960
All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

559
00:47:28,031 --> 00:47:31,830
Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

560
00:47:31,906 --> 00:47:35,867
You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

561
00:47:35,938 --> 00:47:38,493
Yeah.

562
00:47:38,564 --> 00:47:43,519
Eyes see. lt's one of the most important
things l learned from my sister.

563
00:47:43,590 --> 00:47:46,723
Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

564
00:47:46,791 --> 00:47:49,989
My father's daughter.
That's right.

565
00:47:50,057 --> 00:47:53,124
What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

566
00:47:53,193 --> 00:47:55,366
Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

567
00:47:55,434 --> 00:47:58,788
With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

568
00:47:58,915 --> 00:48:02,232
He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

569
00:48:02,308 --> 00:48:05,571
He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

570
00:48:05,637 --> 00:48:07,776
Whatever the fuck that means.

571
00:48:07,846 --> 00:48:11,460
Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

572
00:48:12,520 --> 00:48:14,495
Want to relax
that thing now?

573
00:48:14,569 --> 00:48:19,044
This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

574
00:48:19,115 --> 00:48:23,306
You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?

575
00:48:23,373 --> 00:48:25,959
l ain't makin' all this up.

576
00:48:26,029 --> 00:48:30,374
l ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

577
00:48:32,079 --> 00:48:34,120
All right.

578
00:48:38,579 --> 00:48:43,402
A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

579
00:48:43,476 --> 00:48:46,990
Yeah. [ Laughing ]

580
00:48:53,240 --> 00:48:56,111
For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

581
00:49:02,780 --> 00:49:04,984
Thanks.

582
00:49:05,052 --> 00:49:07,257
Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

583
00:49:07,325 --> 00:49:09,814
A big one.

584
00:49:09,886 --> 00:49:14,557
Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

585
00:49:14,624 --> 00:49:18,400
l'll have the janitor
come on up.

586
00:49:22,659 --> 00:49:24,732
[ Purring ]

587
00:49:24,804 --> 00:49:29,507
** [ Electric Guitar ]

588
00:49:40,522 --> 00:49:44,167
[ Siren Wailing ]

589
00:50:12,214 --> 00:50:17,583
- ** [ Rock Playing ]
- [ Crow Caws ]

590
00:50:17,656 --> 00:50:19,828
You again.

591
00:50:19,896 --> 00:50:22,166
You lost or hungry?

592
00:50:22,233 --> 00:50:24,918
- Hi.
- [ Caws ]

593
00:50:27,163 --> 00:50:29,018
* lt can't rain all the time *

594
00:50:29,084 --> 00:50:33,427
[ Skipping ]
* Can't rain all the time *

595
00:50:42,145 --> 00:50:44,731
[ T-bird ] l don't know how many times l
gotta tell you. We're in this together!

596
00:50:44,801 --> 00:50:47,617
One part falls, it all falls!

597
00:50:47,682 --> 00:50:51,000
- You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

598
00:50:51,076 --> 00:50:53,532
That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

599
00:50:53,605 --> 00:50:55,613
Tin Tin was a dick.

600
00:50:55,686 --> 00:50:58,557
Tin Tin.
Sheesh.

601
00:50:58,632 --> 00:51:02,659
Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

602
00:51:02,729 --> 00:51:04,585
Fire it up!

603
00:51:07,050 --> 00:51:09,058
No Funboy.

604
00:51:09,131 --> 00:51:12,907
Probably still...
bangin' away on Darla.

605
00:51:12,973 --> 00:51:15,789
- [ Grunting ]
- [ Whistles ]

606
00:51:18,062 --> 00:51:21,031
Smokes and road beers.
Be quick.

607
00:51:21,103 --> 00:51:23,013
l'm on it.

608
00:51:28,370 --> 00:51:33,458
[ Man Talking On Phone ]

609
00:51:33,525 --> 00:51:36,374
[ Sighs ]

610
00:51:40,406 --> 00:51:42,742
[ Cawing ]

611
00:51:52,443 --> 00:51:55,860
What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

612
00:51:55,933 --> 00:52:00,374
- [ Cawing ]
- l'm your passenger.

613
00:52:07,009 --> 00:52:09,049
Drive.

614
00:52:11,075 --> 00:52:13,891
[ Motor Starts ]

615
00:52:13,956 --> 00:52:15,680
What's all this
happy horseshit?

616
00:52:15,748 --> 00:52:17,788
- [ Tires Screeching ]
- Hey, T-bird! T-bird!

617
00:52:17,860 --> 00:52:20,993
- [ Horn Honking ]
- [ Screams ]

618
00:52:21,062 --> 00:52:22,918
[ Brakes Screeching ]

619
00:52:22,983 --> 00:52:26,116
- Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

620
00:52:26,185 --> 00:52:30,015
Stupid asshair!
You hit my car!

621
00:52:30,089 --> 00:52:32,228
[ Groaning ]

622
00:52:36,716 --> 00:52:40,972
What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? l got it.

623
00:52:42,511 --> 00:52:45,294
We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

624
00:52:45,359 --> 00:52:48,328
- This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

625
00:52:51,154 --> 00:52:55,182
You got that cream stuff?

626
00:52:55,252 --> 00:52:57,555
l hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

627
00:52:59,093 --> 00:53:01,941
- What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

628
00:53:02,006 --> 00:53:04,112
[ Screaming ]

629
00:53:05,303 --> 00:53:08,021
Oh, look. Makin' us popular.

630
00:53:08,088 --> 00:53:10,675
When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

631
00:53:10,745 --> 00:53:15,962
[ Siren Wailing ]

632
00:53:16,027 --> 00:53:18,898
This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

633
00:53:21,310 --> 00:53:23,383
Turn.

634
00:53:24,670 --> 00:53:27,323
You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

635
00:53:27,391 --> 00:53:31,550
- Right? Huh?
- [ Crow Cawing ]

636
00:53:33,058 --> 00:53:35,426
[ Groans ]
Damn! Dead end!

637
00:53:35,491 --> 00:53:37,631
[ Cawing ]

638
00:53:40,612 --> 00:53:42,980
- [ Man ] Look out!
- [ Woman Screams ]

639
00:53:46,151 --> 00:53:48,290
Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

640
00:53:58,924 --> 00:54:03,016
- [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

641
00:54:03,085 --> 00:54:06,469
[ Siren Wailing ]

642
00:54:06,542 --> 00:54:08,910
Shit! Shit!

643
00:54:15,762 --> 00:54:19,309
Oh, l hate this.
This ain't good.

644
00:54:20,691 --> 00:54:24,009
T-bird!
l got you, man!

645
00:54:24,085 --> 00:54:26,387
- Shit!
- [ Screaming ]

646
00:54:30,007 --> 00:54:34,831
[ Groaning, Car Door Chiming ]

647
00:54:39,227 --> 00:54:41,432
[ T-bird ] Remember?
Yeah, l remember everything.

648
00:54:41,500 --> 00:54:44,600
But l don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

649
00:54:44,669 --> 00:54:47,321
What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

650
00:54:47,390 --> 00:54:50,358
You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, l remember her.

651
00:54:50,431 --> 00:54:52,504
We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

652
00:54:52,575 --> 00:54:55,708
She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

653
00:54:55,777 --> 00:54:59,226
And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

654
00:54:59,298 --> 00:55:02,595
into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

655
00:55:02,660 --> 00:55:05,793
lt's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

656
00:55:05,862 --> 00:55:10,565
What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

657
00:55:12,103 --> 00:55:13,893
Did you send us
these complaints?

658
00:55:15,528 --> 00:55:18,726
Come here!
''Abashed the devil stood.''

659
00:55:18,794 --> 00:55:21,064
Does it get you sweaty?

660
00:55:21,131 --> 00:55:26,119
l know you. l know you.
l knew l knew you.

661
00:55:26,189 --> 00:55:30,113
l knew l knew you.
But you ain't you.

662
00:55:30,240 --> 00:55:34,039
You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

663
00:55:34,115 --> 00:55:37,411
This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

664
00:55:37,476 --> 00:55:39,746
We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

665
00:55:39,813 --> 00:55:44,091
[ Grunting, Muttering ]
T-bird--

666
00:55:44,166 --> 00:55:47,014
There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!

667
00:55:49,481 --> 00:55:53,475
- T-bird.
- [ T-bird Panting ]

668
00:55:53,545 --> 00:55:56,776
- [ Engine Revs ]
- ''Abashed the devil stood...

669
00:55:56,843 --> 00:55:59,659
and felt how awful goodness is.''

670
00:55:59,724 --> 00:56:02,507
''And felt how awful goodness is.''

671
00:56:07,055 --> 00:56:10,886
[ Tires Squealing ]

672
00:56:15,986 --> 00:56:18,475
[ Gasping ]
T-bird. T-bird.

673
00:56:45,085 --> 00:56:48,250
[ Crow Caws ]

674
00:57:06,789 --> 00:57:08,994
[ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

675
00:57:09,062 --> 00:57:11,299
For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

676
00:57:11,367 --> 00:57:15,559
has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, ''Devil's Night''...

677
00:57:15,625 --> 00:57:18,921
the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

678
00:57:18,986 --> 00:57:24,138
Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

679
00:57:24,204 --> 00:57:29,159
Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

680
00:57:29,230 --> 00:57:32,711
The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

681
00:57:32,783 --> 00:57:36,429
Do you like them up or over?
l can't remember.

682
00:57:38,385 --> 00:57:41,004
What are you doing?
l don't even like eggs.

683
00:57:41,074 --> 00:57:45,812
- Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when l was five.

684
00:57:45,877 --> 00:57:49,839
So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

685
00:57:49,910 --> 00:57:53,107
So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

686
00:57:53,176 --> 00:57:58,065
Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

687
00:57:58,136 --> 00:58:03,670
- Who?
- Oh, it was nuts.

688
00:58:03,739 --> 00:58:08,761
You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

689
00:58:11,167 --> 00:58:15,291
Oh, forget it. l never was
too good at this mommy shit.

690
00:58:15,360 --> 00:58:17,466
Over easy.

691
00:58:19,489 --> 00:58:23,997
l like 'em
over easy... Mom.

692
00:58:34,151 --> 00:58:36,323
Hey, Albrecht.

693
00:58:36,392 --> 00:58:38,880
[ Sighs ]

694
00:58:38,952 --> 00:58:41,768
This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

695
00:58:41,833 --> 00:58:44,966
We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

696
00:58:45,035 --> 00:58:49,096
- We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

697
00:58:49,165 --> 00:58:51,020
Arson was his specialty.

698
00:58:51,085 --> 00:58:52,973
Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

699
00:58:53,037 --> 00:58:56,814
- Case closed.
- Bull-fuckin'-shit.

700
00:58:56,879 --> 00:58:59,051
Come here.

701
00:59:02,641 --> 00:59:04,551
You're holding out on me.

702
00:59:04,626 --> 00:59:08,010
l got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

703
00:59:08,084 --> 00:59:11,216
and you're covering up
for somebody.

704
00:59:11,284 --> 00:59:13,619
Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

705
00:59:13,686 --> 00:59:17,430
- You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

706
00:59:17,495 --> 00:59:19,535
Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

707
00:59:19,608 --> 00:59:22,359
who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

708
00:59:22,425 --> 00:59:25,273
Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

709
00:59:25,338 --> 00:59:27,194
and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

710
00:59:27,259 --> 00:59:29,463
- Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

711
00:59:29,532 --> 00:59:31,474
l didn't want to interrupt you.
lt sounded good.

712
00:59:31,548 --> 00:59:33,437
You gotta write that shit down.

713
00:59:33,502 --> 00:59:35,357
All right, smart-ass.

714
00:59:35,422 --> 00:59:38,358
The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

715
00:59:38,431 --> 00:59:42,208
- Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

716
00:59:42,273 --> 00:59:45,852
- For what?
- Misconduct.

717
00:59:45,922 --> 00:59:49,786
[ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

718
00:59:49,859 --> 00:59:54,268
[ Thunder Rumbling ]

719
01:00:04,105 --> 01:00:05,960
[ Grunting ]

720
01:00:31,091 --> 01:00:34,834
** [ Electric Guitar ]

721
01:00:38,454 --> 01:00:40,943
[ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

722
01:00:41,015 --> 01:00:43,732
- Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

723
01:00:48,570 --> 01:00:52,215
Dancing--

724
01:01:02,047 --> 01:01:04,666
[ Paper Ripping ]

725
01:01:22,086 --> 01:01:23,942
Eric?

726
01:01:24,007 --> 01:01:26,496
[ Rain Falling ]

727
01:01:26,569 --> 01:01:30,661
[ Sighs ] Man, Sarah,
you're going crazy.

728
01:01:30,729 --> 01:01:33,545
- Gabriel.
- [ Meows ]

729
01:01:33,610 --> 01:01:36,262
l thought you were dead.

730
01:01:36,332 --> 01:01:39,464
You're not dead, are you?

731
01:02:03,222 --> 01:02:06,038
l knew it was you.

732
01:02:07,864 --> 01:02:10,679
Even with the makeup.

733
01:02:15,323 --> 01:02:17,811
l remembered your song.

734
01:02:17,884 --> 01:02:21,497
You said,
''Can't rain all the time.''

735
01:02:21,565 --> 01:02:24,698
That is from your song, right?

736
01:02:34,210 --> 01:02:37,211
- [ Cawing ]
- Come on, Eric. l know you're here.

737
01:02:39,492 --> 01:02:43,421
l miss you...
and Shelly.

738
01:02:46,374 --> 01:02:49,671
Get so lonely
all by myself.

739
01:02:51,464 --> 01:02:55,906
The hell with you.
l thought you cared.

740
01:02:55,978 --> 01:02:58,979
Sarah, l do care.

741
01:03:09,732 --> 01:03:11,772
That's him.
That's him!

742
01:03:11,845 --> 01:03:15,043
But he looked different. He was painted
up white like some kind of dead whore.

743
01:03:15,110 --> 01:03:18,243
l seen him. T-bird sent me in
for some road beers, right?

744
01:03:18,312 --> 01:03:20,768
Then he took him away.
But l chased him down.

745
01:03:20,841 --> 01:03:23,525
And he flash fried T-bird
to his fuckin' car!

746
01:03:23,593 --> 01:03:26,977
Aw, T-bird!
Here's to you, buddy.

747
01:03:27,051 --> 01:03:30,828
Maybe we oughta just videotape this.
Play it back in slow motion.

748
01:03:32,076 --> 01:03:36,486
- Fire it up! Fire it up!
- You see the grave?

749
01:03:36,559 --> 01:03:39,048
- Empty.
- Fire it--

750
01:03:39,120 --> 01:03:40,975
Grave?
What grave?

751
01:03:41,040 --> 01:03:43,180
What about
my fuckin' grave?

752
01:03:43,249 --> 01:03:44,526
- [ Screams ]
- Three out of four.

753
01:03:44,594 --> 01:03:47,726
He's working his way back
to this speed freak right here.

754
01:03:47,795 --> 01:03:50,348
lt's not fair.
lt's Funboy's fault.

755
01:03:50,419 --> 01:03:53,454
That boy was out of control.
T-bird, he came in, he says...
[ Whistles ]

756
01:03:53,525 --> 01:03:56,690
...''Waste them both.'' And now
this ghost gonna kill my ass next!

757
01:03:56,758 --> 01:04:00,502
[ Groaning ]

758
01:04:00,568 --> 01:04:03,537
This ghost gonna
kill my ass next.

759
01:04:03,610 --> 01:04:07,222
- This ghost gonna kill--
- Hey.

760
01:04:07,290 --> 01:04:09,179
That ain't no ghost.

761
01:04:11,003 --> 01:04:14,038
- They have all arrived.
- Watch him.

762
01:04:14,109 --> 01:04:16,019
We might need him.

763
01:04:17,470 --> 01:04:19,805
Ghost gonna kill my--

764
01:04:32,036 --> 01:04:35,812
He like his plain
or with onions?

765
01:04:35,878 --> 01:04:39,173
Fine.
Don't talk to me.

766
01:04:39,238 --> 01:04:43,169
When someone's dead,
they can't come back, can they?

767
01:04:43,240 --> 01:04:45,728
That's what l thought.

768
01:04:45,801 --> 01:04:48,453
Are you referring
to anyone in particular?

769
01:04:48,522 --> 01:04:50,694
You'll just think
l'm nuts.

770
01:04:50,763 --> 01:04:54,212
Yeah, well, then maybe
they'll have to lock us both up.

771
01:04:54,284 --> 01:04:59,436
- You see him too?
- l saw somebody.

772
01:04:59,502 --> 01:05:02,852
Maybe it was
your fairy godfather.

773
01:05:02,927 --> 01:05:05,743
Eric didn't come back for me.

774
01:05:05,808 --> 01:05:10,382
He can't be my friend anymore
because l'm alive.

775
01:05:10,451 --> 01:05:13,518
You want a friend
to walk you home?

776
01:05:13,588 --> 01:05:18,608
** [ Electric Guitar ]

777
01:05:42,782 --> 01:05:45,652
- [ Screaming ]
- * l am the wicked
l am the wave of the future *

778
01:05:58,212 --> 01:06:00,068
[ Woman ] * Being crucified *

779
01:06:00,133 --> 01:06:04,258
* You things, things
things of the flesh *

780
01:06:04,326 --> 01:06:06,913
* Do it slow *

781
01:06:06,984 --> 01:06:11,110
* Down avenues ''cut me'' *

782
01:06:11,178 --> 01:06:14,724
* Lust my eyes *

783
01:06:14,794 --> 01:06:20,809
* Licking lips encouraging
Mr. Careworn *

784
01:06:20,877 --> 01:06:26,760
* To gaze upon the screen bask on *

785
01:06:26,831 --> 01:06:28,774
* After the flesh **

786
01:06:40,277 --> 01:06:43,726
[ Whimpering ]

787
01:06:43,797 --> 01:06:46,614
Boys.

788
01:06:46,679 --> 01:06:49,975
lt seems our friend T-bird won't be
joining us this evening...

789
01:06:50,040 --> 01:06:52,049
on account of
a slight case of death.

790
01:06:52,122 --> 01:06:54,009
- [ Men Chuckling ]
- You wanna sit down?

791
01:06:54,074 --> 01:06:59,225
- [ Groaning ]
- Well, well, well.

792
01:06:59,292 --> 01:07:02,227
Devil's Night is
upon us again.

793
01:07:02,300 --> 01:07:04,155
l thought we'd throw
a little party...

794
01:07:04,221 --> 01:07:07,353
start a bunch of fires,
make a little profit.

795
01:07:07,422 --> 01:07:09,563
l like the pretty lights.

796
01:07:09,632 --> 01:07:12,382
[ Laughing ]

797
01:07:12,448 --> 01:07:16,191
Problem is, it's all been done before.
You see what l'm saying?

798
01:07:16,258 --> 01:07:21,246
- That's no reason to quit.
- Wrong. Best reason to quit.

799
01:07:21,316 --> 01:07:23,619
Only reason to quit.

800
01:07:23,685 --> 01:07:28,957
A man has an idea.

801
01:07:29,030 --> 01:07:31,202
The idea attracts others...

802
01:07:31,271 --> 01:07:33,279
like-minded.

803
01:07:33,352 --> 01:07:35,361
The idea expands.

804
01:07:35,434 --> 01:07:38,948
The idea becomes
an institution.

805
01:07:39,018 --> 01:07:41,573
What was the idea?

806
01:07:41,644 --> 01:07:45,256
See, that's what's
been bothering me, boys.

807
01:07:45,325 --> 01:07:48,009
But l'll tell ya, when l used
to think about the idea itself...

808
01:07:48,078 --> 01:07:51,046
it'd put a big old smile on my face.

809
01:07:51,118 --> 01:07:53,225
You see, gentlemen...

810
01:07:53,296 --> 01:07:58,087
greed is for amateurs.

811
01:07:58,162 --> 01:08:03,149
Disorder, chaos, anarchy...

812
01:08:03,220 --> 01:08:05,708
now that's fun!

813
01:08:05,780 --> 01:08:07,986
- What about Devil's Night?
- What about it?

814
01:08:08,054 --> 01:08:11,316
l started the first fires
in this goddamn city.

815
01:08:11,383 --> 01:08:14,351
Before l knew it, every charlatan
and shitheel was imitating me.

816
01:08:14,423 --> 01:08:17,720
Do you know
what they got now?

817
01:08:17,785 --> 01:08:21,878
Devil's Night greeting cards.

818
01:08:21,948 --> 01:08:24,763
lsn't that precious?

819
01:08:24,829 --> 01:08:26,836
Yeah.

820
01:08:26,908 --> 01:08:31,481
The idea has become
the institution, boys.

821
01:08:31,551 --> 01:08:33,494
Time to move along.

822
01:08:33,568 --> 01:08:35,903
You don't want us to do
''Light My Fire'' time for the whole city?

823
01:08:35,968 --> 01:08:38,358
No.

824
01:08:38,433 --> 01:08:40,921
No, l want you to set
a fire so goddamn big...

825
01:08:40,994 --> 01:08:43,963
the gods will notice us again.
That's what l'm saying.

826
01:08:44,036 --> 01:08:46,524
l want all of you boys to be able
to look me straight in the eye...

827
01:08:46,596 --> 01:08:50,853
one more time and say,
''Are we having fun or what?''

828
01:08:50,918 --> 01:08:52,925
- Hey, you! What's your name?
- Huh?

829
01:08:52,998 --> 01:08:54,854
Skank!
You don't feel that?

830
01:08:54,919 --> 01:08:58,084
- l feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.
- [ All Laughing ]

831
01:08:58,152 --> 01:09:00,454
''l feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.''

832
01:09:00,521 --> 01:09:04,745
Well, boy, your mama
must be damn proud of you!

833
01:09:04,811 --> 01:09:07,048
- [ Crow Caws ]
- [ Gasps ]

834
01:09:07,116 --> 01:09:09,637
How the hell did
that thing get in here?

835
01:09:10,978 --> 01:09:13,368
- Gentlemen.
- [ Skank Screams ]

836
01:09:13,443 --> 01:09:17,885
[ Skank Whimpering ] Let me go!
Let me go! l gotta go!

837
01:09:22,279 --> 01:09:25,892
You're him, huh?
The avenger.

838
01:09:25,960 --> 01:09:28,350
The killer of killers.

839
01:09:28,425 --> 01:09:31,143
- Nice outfit.
- [ Whimpering ]

840
01:09:31,210 --> 01:09:33,185
l'm not sure
about the face though.

841
01:09:33,259 --> 01:09:35,235
l just want him.

842
01:09:35,307 --> 01:09:38,603
- [ Whimpering ]
- Well, you can't have him.

843
01:09:38,669 --> 01:09:41,222
Well...

844
01:09:43,215 --> 01:09:45,582
l see you have
made your decision.

845
01:09:47,087 --> 01:09:48,998
Now let's see you enforce it.

846
01:09:49,073 --> 01:09:52,588
Aw, this is already boring the shit
out of me. Kill him!

847
01:09:58,229 --> 01:10:02,004
Ooh, that had to hurt.

848
01:10:02,070 --> 01:10:04,754
- [ All Laughing ]
- Well, that's that.

849
01:10:04,822 --> 01:10:07,857
- [ Laughing Continues ]
- That guy was crazy.

850
01:10:10,105 --> 01:10:12,823
[ Caws ]

851
01:10:14,234 --> 01:10:15,958
He's gone.
[ Screams ]

852
01:10:16,026 --> 01:10:21,463
[ Screaming, Gunfire ]

853
01:10:23,678 --> 01:10:25,303
Get him!

854
01:10:30,560 --> 01:10:33,856
- [ Whimpering ]
- [ Gunfire ]

855
01:10:41,893 --> 01:10:44,545
Right here! Here, help me!
He's gonna kill me!

856
01:10:48,455 --> 01:10:50,366
Jesus Christ!

857
01:11:06,125 --> 01:11:08,014
Hey!

858
01:11:39,194 --> 01:11:41,431
You're all going to die.

859
01:11:52,383 --> 01:11:55,767
[ Screaming ]

860
01:11:55,841 --> 01:11:58,559
[ Man ] Get the fuck outta here!

861
01:12:10,342 --> 01:12:12,798
[ Crowd Screaming ]

862
01:12:12,871 --> 01:12:18,143
[ Whimpering, Gasping ]

863
01:12:22,571 --> 01:12:27,329
[ Whimpering ]

864
01:12:27,404 --> 01:12:28,834
[ Screams ]

865
01:12:32,878 --> 01:12:35,694
Guess it's not a good day
to be a bad guy, huh, Skank?

866
01:12:35,759 --> 01:12:38,859
l'm not Skank.
There's Skank right there.

867
01:12:38,928 --> 01:12:42,672
- Skank's dead.
- That's right.

868
01:12:42,738 --> 01:12:44,462
[ Screaming ] No!

869
01:12:44,530 --> 01:12:48,810
[ Whimpering ]

870
01:12:48,884 --> 01:12:52,399
- [ Body Crashing ]
- What in the crap--

871
01:12:53,686 --> 01:12:56,207
- Don't move!
- Hold it!

872
01:12:56,279 --> 01:12:59,576
That's all she wrote!
Move and we shoot!

873
01:13:06,171 --> 01:13:08,244
[ Siren Blaring ]

874
01:13:08,316 --> 01:13:11,066
You are surrounded by police units.
Do not attempt to escape.

875
01:13:11,133 --> 01:13:14,298
[ Gunfire Continues ]

876
01:13:14,366 --> 01:13:17,848
- Stop running immediately.
- Holy shit!

877
01:13:17,920 --> 01:13:19,960
...arms and legs--

878
01:13:25,315 --> 01:13:29,889
Stop immediately.
Lie down, spread your arms and legs--

879
01:14:08,883 --> 01:14:13,326
- [ Tires Screeching ]
- Come on! Move it!

880
01:14:17,558 --> 01:14:20,559
My advice:
Next time duck.

881
01:14:22,521 --> 01:14:24,790
So many cops, you'd think
they were giving away donuts.

882
01:14:24,858 --> 01:14:28,055
- [ Sirens Wailing ]
- [ Brakes Screeching ]

883
01:14:28,123 --> 01:14:31,091
- Shit!
- [ Door Opening ]

884
01:14:33,885 --> 01:14:36,668
Oh. l knew you
were gonna do that.

885
01:14:36,734 --> 01:14:39,102
Look at that out there.

886
01:14:39,166 --> 01:14:41,982
The whole city oughta be
in flames by now.

887
01:14:42,047 --> 01:14:45,114
Sky oughta be red.

888
01:14:45,184 --> 01:14:49,342
So that, l take it,
is the late, great Eric Draven.

889
01:14:49,410 --> 01:14:54,880
He has power, but it is power
you can take from him.

890
01:14:54,949 --> 01:14:57,797
- l like him already.
- The crow...

891
01:14:57,862 --> 01:15:02,173
is his link between
the land of the living...

892
01:15:02,247 --> 01:15:04,484
and the realm of the dead.

893
01:15:04,552 --> 01:15:08,896
So, kill the crow
and destroy the man.

894
01:15:08,970 --> 01:15:10,858
Hmm.

895
01:15:33,043 --> 01:15:34,954
l'm coming home, Shelly.

896
01:15:35,028 --> 01:15:37,133
[ Laughing ]

897
01:15:37,204 --> 01:15:42,673
[ Laughing Continues ]

898
01:15:42,743 --> 01:15:44,631
[ Chuckles ]

899
01:15:48,729 --> 01:15:52,757
[ Children Laughing, Hooting ]

900
01:15:52,827 --> 01:15:56,919
[ Laughing ]

901
01:16:22,054 --> 01:16:24,389
You're gonna say
l shouldn't be in the cemetery...

902
01:16:24,454 --> 01:16:26,429
in the middle
of the night, right?

903
01:16:26,503 --> 01:16:28,194
Safest place in the world to be.

904
01:16:28,263 --> 01:16:32,837
lt's 'cause everybody's dead.
l knew you'd come here.

905
01:16:32,905 --> 01:16:36,900
lt's really late, Sarah.

906
01:16:36,971 --> 01:16:39,621
You didn't say good-bye.

907
01:16:39,748 --> 01:16:43,547
You're just gonna have
to forgive me for that.

908
01:16:43,623 --> 01:16:47,683
And you're never coming back.

909
01:16:53,739 --> 01:16:56,839
l gave this to Shelly once.

910
01:17:00,428 --> 01:17:03,244
l think she'd like you
to have it.

911
01:17:07,151 --> 01:17:09,323
This way you'll
always remember her.

912
01:17:09,392 --> 01:17:11,848
l'll never take it off.

913
01:17:29,272 --> 01:17:32,950
l better go sneak
back in the house.

914
01:17:38,811 --> 01:17:40,699
Bye.

915
01:17:59,875 --> 01:18:02,593
- [ Muffled Screaming ]
- Shh! Shh!

916
01:18:04,421 --> 01:18:06,724
Shh. Take it easy, sweetheart.

917
01:18:06,790 --> 01:18:11,396
[ Muffled Screaming Continues ]

918
01:18:13,384 --> 01:18:15,752
Come on.
Come on.

919
01:18:28,494 --> 01:18:32,457
What is that? Some sort of souvenir
there from your pal?

920
01:18:34,000 --> 01:18:36,969
l'll just keep it for good luck.
What do you say, hmm?

921
01:18:43,156 --> 01:18:46,321
Her eyes are so innocent.

922
01:18:57,209 --> 01:18:59,065
- [ Sarah ] Eric!
- [ Caws ]

923
01:18:59,130 --> 01:19:02,928
Eric, help! Eric!

924
01:19:06,365 --> 01:19:09,333
[ Thunderclap ]

925
01:19:11,294 --> 01:19:13,150
[ Crow Caws ]

926
01:19:26,533 --> 01:19:28,638
[ Crow Flapping, Caws ]

927
01:19:40,746 --> 01:19:43,846
Quick impression for ya.

928
01:19:43,915 --> 01:19:47,495
Caw! Caw! Bang!
Fuck, l'm dead!

929
01:19:47,565 --> 01:19:50,763
Give me the girl
and l'll let you walk out of here.

930
01:19:50,830 --> 01:19:53,766
[ lnhales ]
Well, well.

931
01:19:53,839 --> 01:19:57,452
Why don't you just give me a minute
to think about that, huh?

932
01:20:01,714 --> 01:20:04,049
[ Cawing ]

933
01:20:05,075 --> 01:20:07,279
Nah. Fuck it.

934
01:20:13,046 --> 01:20:15,316
[ Chuckles ]

935
01:20:15,382 --> 01:20:17,456
Aw, fuck.

936
01:20:20,536 --> 01:20:24,335
[ Muffled Screaming ]

937
01:20:24,410 --> 01:20:28,755
Well, well, well. lt does seem to me
that our little life has undergone...

938
01:20:28,828 --> 01:20:32,538
a rather significant change in the past
few minutes now. Wouldn't you agree?

939
01:20:32,605 --> 01:20:36,601
[ Groaning ]

940
01:20:36,671 --> 01:20:39,934
Well, for a ghost,
you bleed just fine.

941
01:20:43,329 --> 01:20:45,501
- lt's still alive.
- Well, then kill it!

942
01:20:47,074 --> 01:20:49,214
Bye-bye, birdie.

943
01:21:32,468 --> 01:21:34,476
Ah, shit.

944
01:21:34,549 --> 01:21:36,557
Well, just came by
to pay my respects...

945
01:21:36,629 --> 01:21:38,573
and here you are
getting all shot up again.

946
01:21:38,647 --> 01:21:41,135
- They've taken Sarah.
- How many?

947
01:21:41,207 --> 01:21:43,117
Two more.
[ Groans ]

948
01:21:43,192 --> 01:21:45,102
l can handle it.
Don't worry.

949
01:21:45,177 --> 01:21:47,600
l'm not worried.
Look, here's the plan.

950
01:21:47,674 --> 01:21:50,326
You stay in front, and when they
run out of ammo, l'll arrest 'em.

951
01:21:50,396 --> 01:21:53,974
That sounds like a great plan.
There's just one problem.

952
01:21:56,476 --> 01:21:59,893
Oh, shit.
You're bleeding all over the place.

953
01:21:59,966 --> 01:22:01,942
l thought, you know,
you were invincible.

954
01:22:02,016 --> 01:22:05,333
l was.
l'm not anymore.

955
01:22:05,409 --> 01:22:09,469
[ Sighs ] Well, l guess you really will
need my help, won't you?

956
01:22:09,538 --> 01:22:12,321
- Come on.
- [ Groaning ]

957
01:22:14,884 --> 01:22:16,859
You take that.

958
01:22:45,712 --> 01:22:49,029
- You were supposed to stay behind me.
- l think l messed up.

959
01:23:10,265 --> 01:23:12,087
[ Crow Caws ]

960
01:23:12,153 --> 01:23:15,253
This is all the power
you ever had.

961
01:23:15,322 --> 01:23:17,331
Now it is mine.

962
01:23:17,404 --> 01:23:20,950
Pity there's not more time...

963
01:23:21,021 --> 01:23:23,543
- [ Gun Cocks ]
- ...for us.

964
01:23:24,926 --> 01:23:30,427
[ Woman Screaming ]

965
01:23:32,034 --> 01:23:35,810
[ Screaming ]

966
01:23:37,059 --> 01:23:40,858
[ Screaming Continues ]

967
01:23:40,934 --> 01:23:43,684
[ Sarah ] Help, Eric!
l'm scared!

968
01:23:45,702 --> 01:23:48,158
Let me go!

969
01:23:56,875 --> 01:24:00,258
Let her go!

970
01:24:00,332 --> 01:24:03,119
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

971
01:24:03,119 --> 01:24:04,745
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

972
01:24:04,815 --> 01:24:06,726
All right.

973
01:24:06,801 --> 01:24:08,743
- [ Sarah Screams ]
- No!

974
01:24:12,403 --> 01:24:17,522
[ Gasping, Groaning ]

975
01:24:19,701 --> 01:24:21,678
[ Crow Caws ]

976
01:24:21,750 --> 01:24:24,020
[ Thunderclap ]

977
01:24:24,087 --> 01:24:26,325
[ Gasping ]

978
01:24:26,393 --> 01:24:28,433
- [ Thunderclap ]
- [ Screams ]

979
01:24:47,296 --> 01:24:50,047
[ Swords Clanking ]

980

986

987

till you find him.''

988

What happened back there

989

l cleared that building.

990

Hell, nothing in this town
happens without my say-so.

991
01:25:45,558 --> 01:25:48,309

your wedding plans, friend.

992
01:25:48,376 --> 01:25:51,094

to you...

993
01:25:51,160 --> 01:25:54,642
you have put
a smile on my face.

994
01:25:54,714 --> 01:25:57,235
You got a lot
of spirit, son.

995
01:25:57,307 --> 01:25:59,796
[ Unsheathes Knife ]
l am going to miss you.

996
01:25:59,868 --> 01:26:02,290

to give you.

997
01:26:02,365 --> 01:26:04,667

998
01:26:08,959 --> 01:26:11,862

999
01:26:14,113 --> 01:26:16,699

- [ Groaning ]

1000

1004
01:26:59,762 --> 01:27:01,934

1005
01:27:03,860 --> 01:27:07,690

God, l need a cigarette.

1006

1007

1008
01:27:17,625 --> 01:27:20,081
What you kept in here
saved me.

1009
01:27:20,154 --> 01:27:23,155

- Don't mention it.

1010
01:27:23,227 --> 01:27:26,098
l've been meaning
to come to church anyway.

1011

Oh, yuck.
[ Spits ]

1012
01:27:33,630 --> 01:27:38,422
l'm quitting as of now...

1013

until help comes.

1014

He'll be okay, right?

1015
01:27:53,319 --> 01:27:55,425
Eric?

1016
